projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus

content.title: Description
content.text: Two weather parameters can be measured and recorded over time for use in monitoring local weather and climate conditions. This can be set up as a long-term monitoring project.

content.title: Materials
text: Intel Galileo Board with sensor module and micro SD card

content.title: Author
content.text: Jason Alcarez, Kelvin Bartilad, Ralph Benedict Bucao
